name: AnimalParty
0:
”Alexa, open animal party.”
”What does a dog sound like?”
”How about a pig?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal party
des:
A skill designed to hear the sounds of different animals! Great for children (and adults to keep children busy)!

We currently support the following animal noises:
 - dog 
- bear
- bird
- cat
- chicken
- elephant
- horse
- lion
- monkey
- rat
- raven
- rooster
- sheep
- turkey
- wolf

Just ask Alexa, "What does a (INSERT ANIMAL NAME HERE) sound like?"
More animal sounds to come over time!

***7/8/18 Update***

New Animal Sounds
- cow
- pig
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
